verse.lines: {lang-eng}"If Thou art the Christ," they taunting, said, "Come down from the cursed tree;" He heeded no jeering word they said. But, bowing His head. He died for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Like a wandering sheep I had gone astray, But all my iniquity My God laid on Him that awful day, When, bearing my sins, He died for me.{/lang-eng}
